page.title: 01LANDSCAPE.
page.content: Our area does not consist of many steep hills. Instead the hills are gently rolling. Also it does not hold any large areas of water. The land has a few farms on it but it has very few amenities. There are woods in the area which are mainly deciduous, but there are also some coniferous woods. The fields are mostly cultivated but there are some left for grazing. The recent buildings are Little Wauldby Farm and some building is going on nearby. The main source of employment in our area is farming. The Wolds Way which is a Public Right of Way goes through some of the farms. The Wolds Way is mainly used as a long distance path for walkers, although horse riders do use it.
